Html:
I used NetOffice to read Office files.
I have problem when deploying to server.
For now, in the server I could read Word files(DOC, RTF), but I don't know why it couldn't read Powerpoint files(PPT), it run forever... and didn't return any errors.
I have Office 2016 in the server.

I found my problem:
pptApplication.Quit();
pptApplication.Dispose();
Powerpoint application cannot quit. It keeps running...
Please help me if you know this problem.
Thanks you so much.

this might be tricky because, office product are not designed to run as or on a server, and there for not supported in this way, future PPT is a difficult product to work with at the best of times, and has it own "rules" to some extent!

one suggestions, make sure nothing is left open - i.e. no PPT file

how do you create the PPT application?
